results.title: Mechanical engineering
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.

results.title: Litho or gravure printing
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows how the basic principles of printing may be applied differently by the lithographic and rotagravure techniques. Shows use of photography in the preparation of litho plates and gravure cylinders. Includes application of these methods to automatic silk screen printing.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows how the basic principles of printing may be applied differently by the lithographic and rotagravure techniques. Shows use of photography in the preparation of litho plates and gravure cylinders. Includes application of these methods to automatic silk screen printing.

results.title: Letterpress printing
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Letterpress printing in which a raised inked pattern is pressed on to a prepared surface requires the work of several trades. Follows the work from linotype operator to typesetter and the final “makeready”. Also shows processes for photographic blockmaking.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Letterpress printing in which a raised inked pattern is pressed on to a prepared surface requires the work of several trades. Follows the work from linotype operator to typesetter and the final “makeready”. Also shows processes for photographic blockmaking.

results.title: Journalism
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A straightforward account of a sometimes over-glamorised profession. The copy boy carries out menial tasks; the cadet learns how to report crime, general, parliamentary, financial and sporting news. The erratic hours of work are shown to apply to radio and television journalism as well as to newspaper work, and the basic demands of the work are similar.

results.title: Industrial chemistry
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Industrial chemists are employed in diverse industries, ranging from the production of soaps and detergents to plastics, petrol and paints. The chemist who has a suitable temperament and knowledge can also enter into the technical sales side.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

results.title: Geologist and geophysicist
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film designed to show the work of the geologist and geophysicist. Explains the university study required, and shows the application to work in mineral exploration, and other fields.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

results.title: Food technology
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing scientists involved in food preparation and storage, and research into development of new processes and packaging methods. Discusses opportunities for the food technologist.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing scientists involved in food preparation and storage, and research into development of new processes and packaging methods. Discusses opportunities for the food technologist.

results.title: Fitting and machining
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A qualified fitter and machinist may go on to become a toolmaker, a works foreman or a draughtsman, or he may rise to executive level in a company. The status of professional engineeer can be achieved by those who complete a diploma course. Shows tradesmen at work with various mechanical tools, such as the lathe, grinder and milling machine.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A qualified fitter and machinist may go on to become a toolmaker, a works foreman or a draughtsman, or he may rise to executive level in a company. The status of professional engineeer can be achieved by those who complete a diploma course. Shows tradesmen at work with various mechanical tools, such as the lathe, grinder and milling machine.
description_for_label:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A qualified fitter and machinist may go on to become a toolmaker, a works foreman or a draughtsman, or he may rise to executive level in a company. results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film. Shows the installation and maintenance of electrical equipment by electrical fitters and mechanics. Discusses the opportunities in this field in Australia.
